parsed.recap:
DEV: Rance's wild Mage-Gift awakened during bandit attack; obliterated Lisle village; Companion Senta Chose him; red robes found hidden under bandit clothing—organized attack suggesting Karse; prisoner-taking indicates blood magic revival; four-day ride to Haven completed; arrived Haven; Healers alerted to wild talent danger; reported Lisle attack to Circle; complete mind-merge with Talia confirmed; Mage-Gift confirmed; quartered at Healer's cottage; Kyril to contact bordering nations; Talia arrived at dawn with resolved decision about shared memory situation; requested private discussion before Selenay meeting.
PEND: Rance's memories of attack still blocked; Talia's recovery and role; Mage-Gift training without teachers; fate of Lisle prisoners unknown; Karse blood magic threat assessment needed; red-robed attackers may return; Rance's Gift untrained, dangerous; scope of threat beyond Valderan; political ramifications of two people with Queen's Own knowledge; Talia's decision about handling their situation; her upcoming meeting with Selenay.
